original_title: Four foreigners arrested with over 16kg of Kush
original_body_lines: Four foreign nationals have been arrested over the possession of 16kg of narcotics known as Kush in Habaraduwa yesterday.
Police said the foreigners were arrested during three separate raids at Hitiyanagala, Thalpe and Pitiduwa areas in Habaraduwa.
The suspects, aged between 21 and 46 are scheduled to be produced before the Galle Magistrate’s Court today.
